title: Pixel 3: How to fix "Your device is corrupt. It can't be trusted.."(All other posts refer to pixel2)
content: My mom downloaded perhaps some corrupted app thinking it was Venmo. Now, her device has that pop up and any options we are given bring us back to that screen or a screen with more information. I see instructions on how to restore it using Command line but they are all for later models of the phone.
